ThingDef.label: bed
ThingDef.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: bed2
ThingDef.description: A cozy mattress and sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: double bed
ThingDef.description: A simple double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: double bed2
ThingDef.description: A Celtic double-wide bed that fits two people.

ThingDef.label: classy double bed
ThingDef.description: Elegant bed decorated with lace that fits two people. It is very comfortable and doesn't get disturbed during sleep.

ThingDef.label: dresser
ThingDef.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: End table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.

ThingDef.label: end table
ThingDef.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.Works as electricity.

ThingDef.label: RGK bucket
ThingDef.description: bucket.

ThingDef.label: RGK orc barrel
ThingDef.description: Just orc barrel

ThingDef.label: simple chair
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: dining chair
ThingDef.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.

ThingDef.label: bench
ThingDef.description: It's a park bench chair. Couples can't sit here.

ThingDef.label: wine rack
ThingDef.description: A shelf that stores wine or alcohol.

ThingDef.label: wardrobe
ThingDef.description: Shelves and drawers for storing clothes.

ThingDef.label: wardrobe
ThingDef.description: Shelves and drawers for storing clothes.

ThingDef.label: bookshelf
ThingDef.description: Increases research speed when placed near research table. Each research bench can use two bookshelf.

ThingDef.label: cupboard
ThingDef.description: A shelf for Tableware. Increases Cook speed when placed near fueled stove table.

ThingDef.label: tableware shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf for Tableware. Increases Cook speed when placed near fueled stove table.

ThingDef.label: manger
ThingDef.description: It's a cask for animals. You can store food and hay.

ThingDef.label: shelf
ThingDef.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: bowl
ThingDef.description: It's a cask for animals. You can store food and hay.

ThingDef.label: locker
ThingDef.description: A locker for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside. Also it prevents the contents from being damaged by fire.

ThingDef.label: replica flower
ThingDef.description: It's a flowerpot replica. It'll be in bloom forever.

ThingDef.label: tea set
ThingDef.description: This is a set of decorative teas. It looks like a luxury, and it's a shame to use it.

ThingDef.label: teddy bear
ThingDef.description: It is a fluffy teddy bear.
